ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Verant priorities again
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Sis! Verant has some kinda serious eye disease - it s having some really bad effects on their Vision(tm) The other day, I sent a couple tells - one to
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Sis!

Verant has some kinda serious eye disease - it's having some really bad
effects on their "Vision(tm)"

The other day, I sent a couple tells - one to the zone and the other on
guildsay and *both* of them elicited "You are not serious - are you???"
responses.

Sylly shouts to the zone, "Did you see the login message??? Littering zones
with foraged items is now a BANNABLE offense!!!"

Sylly tells the guild, "Did you see Gordon's latest post??? They have
discovered that some players are killing NPC's purely for exp and getting
levels. After the next patch, you will no longer get *any* exp from killing
NPC's. All exp will be earned through quests only. They are gonna leave
cetain loot items on NPC's to keep the economy going though."

Sylly

p.s. level 51 is bad, real bad, really really bad. But now I am done and 52
seems a bit better.

p.s.s. I have serious doubts about 54.


----- Original Message -----
From: "Douglass Family" <frd@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 03, 2000 6:43 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Verant priorities again


> Sylly, my twin, I sense much anger from you....... err and sarcasm, and
> well, you get my drift..... Tell me what you really think sis.
>
> Jaezebel Moonsong
> Spirit of the Moon
> Innoruuk
